mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM OPRODUCT WHERE PRODUCTNUM>0 AND PRODUCTNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY PRODUCTNUM DESC) N) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
SELECT COUNT(PRODUCTNUM) FROM (SELECT * FROM OPRODUCT WHERE PRODUCTNUM>0 AND PRODUCTNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE OPRODUCT SET PRODUCTTYPE=#{productType}, PRODUCTNAME=#{productName}, PRIDUCTDETAIL=#{priductDetail}, PRODUCTPRICE=#{productPrice}, PRODUCTDC=#{productDC}, PRODUCTSTOCK=#{productStock} WHERE PRODUCTNUM=#{productNum}
